name: SplatToons
description:
Ur a kid now... Or a squid? LOL.

But seriosly to the point of this demo,A game demo for A new splatoon fangame.

Controls: arrow keys: movement e: splat ball q: restart with new color

By default weapon is a pistol but you can switch between gun and brush with 8 and 7.

You can go through white tiles with orange ink.

Hold space for squid mode
